doc:
John F. Hamilton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_F._Hamilton 0 For the American actor of 1887 - 1958, see John Hamilton (actor).John F. Hamilton (7 November 1893 – 11 July 1967) was an American-born actor who worked for many years in the theatre but only occasionally on film. He is probably best-remembered as "Pops", father of Eva Marie Saint's character, in Elia Kazan's film classic On The Waterfront (1954). He was known as John F. Hamilton to distinguish him from the much more prolific American film actor John Hamilton and from a British actor of youthful roles who worked in England and Europe in the 1930s For the_American_actor of 1887 - 1958 , see John_Hamilton ( actor ) . John_F._Hamilton_(_7_November_1893 – 11_July_1967_) was an_American-born_actor who worked for many_years in the_theatre but only_occasionally on film . He is probably best-remembered as "_Pops_" , father of Eva_Marie_Saint 's_character , in Elia_Kazan 's_film_classic On The_Waterfront_(_1954_) .
